events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate and logged it into our recruitment system.
The candidate's profile has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to extensive software development experience.
Recruiter Jane Doe has been assigned to handle this applicant to proceed with the next recruitment stages efficiently.
Initial phone screening was completed successfully, and the candidate showed strong understanding of software engineering principles.
The candidate responded promptly accepting the invitation to proceed with the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10:00 AM to further assess the candidate's development skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview with excellent performance on coding challenges and system design questions.
An HR interview has been set up for May 23rd to evaluate cultural fit and discuss compensation expectations.
